name: Rotatio (itch) (Profi06)
description:
Rotatio is a game where you help a point on a circle evade incoming enemy bullets by moving and rotating the circle.

Controls (explained in-game)
⬅: Move circle clockwise
➡: Move circle counterclockwise
⬇: Show in-game controls explanation
🅾️ (Z/C/N): Rotate circle clockwise
❎ (X/V/M): Rotate circle counterclockwise
P: Pause

 You can also play it on the BBS-Thread or by typing

load #rotatio

into the command line if you own if you own PICO-8.
